fp1 = (81, -60)
fp2 = (-212, 44)
fp3 = (47, 123)

d1p = 100, a = 143
d2p = 216
d3p = 131

d12 = 310, a = 161
d13 = 185, a = 100

th2 = 143 - 161 = -18
th3 = 143 - 100 = 43

cos(th2) = cos(-18 * pi / 180) = .951056516
cos(th3) = cos(43 * pi / 180) = .731353702

d = d12 * cos(th2) + d13 * cos(th3) / (cos(th2) + cos(th3))
  = 310 * .951056516 + 185 * .731353702 / (.951056516 + .731353702)
  = 375.2481174


w1p = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - d1p / d))
    = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - 100 / 375.2481174))
    = .913658075

w2p = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - d2p / d))
    = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - 216 / 375.2481174))
    = .618329898

w3p = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - d3p / d))
    = sin(pi / 2 * (1 - 131 / 375.2481174))
    = .853376052



-- 2x scaling


b1 = w1p / (d1p * d1p)
   = .913658075 / (100 * 100)
   = .000091366

  w1p * fp1 / (d1p * d1p)
= .913658075 * (81, -60) / (100 * 100)
= (.913658075 * 81 / (100 * 100), .913658075 * -60 / (100 * 100))
= (.00740063, -.005481948)

b1 * fp1 = .000091366 * (81, -60) = (.000091366 * 81, .000091366 * -60) = (.007400646, -.00548196)

b2 = w2p / (d2p * d2p)
   = .618329898 / (216 * 216)
   = .000013253

b2 * fp2 = .000013253 * (-212, 44)
         = (.000013253 * -212, .000013253 * 44)
         = (-.002809636, .000583132)

b3 = w3p / (d3p * d3p)
   = .853376052 / (131 * 131)
   = .000049728

b3 * fp3 = .000049728 * (47, 123)
         = (.000049728 * 47, .000049728 * 123)
         = (.002337216, .006116544)

b = .000091366 + .000013253 + .000049728
  = .000154347

a = (.00740063, -.005481948) + (-.002809636, .000583132) + (.002337216, .006116544)
  = (.00740063 -.002809636 + .002337216, -.005481948 + .000583132 + .006116544)
  = (.00692821, .001217728)

a / b = (.00692821, .001217728) / .000154347
      = (.00692821 / .000154347, .001217728 / .000154347)
      = (44.887234608, 7.889547578)    moved ???


-- translating (100, 100)

b1 * fp1 = .000091366 * (100, 100)
         = (.0091366, .0091366)

b2 * fp2 = .000013253 * (100, 100)
         = (.0013253, .0013253)

b3 * fp3 = .000049728 * (100, 100)
         = (.0049728, .0049728)

a = (.0091366, .0091366) + (.0013253, .0013253) + (.0049728, .0049728)
  = (.0091366 + .0013253 + .0049728, .0091366 + .0013253 + .0049728)
  = (.0154347, .0154347)

b = .000091366 + .000013253 + .000049728
  = .000154347

a / b = (.0154347, .0154347) / .000154347
      = (100, 100)
